content: in a court case in la spezia a judge has made a decision regarding compensation after 11 years and 5 months the judge has ordered the dissolution of a community property between two parties and assigned specific lots of property and cash to each party based on their contributions and relationships the judge has also ordered the payment of certain amounts to settle the division of assets the case originated from a claim brought by one party for the division of the deceaseds estate including a property acquired by a cooperative the judge appointed a special curator to represent the interests of a minor involved in the case after hearings and investigations the judge determined the legal heirs and the assets to be divided the judge proposed a division plan for the assets and determined the amounts to be paid to each party the court made a final ruling stating the testator made donations to two individuals the court ordered the dissolution of the community hereditaments between the parties assigned different lots of cash investments and property to each party and ordered a settlement of cash investments to be paid the court also addressed the costs of the proceedings and awarded costs to the parties involved the ruling was made on january 22 2020 in the court of first instance in la spezia

metadata.CASE_ID: Court La Spezia sec. I, 23/01/2020, no. 45
metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, company shares
